body_html:
System information

  • Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow):
    yes the code to reproduce the bug
  • OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): both, Windows 10 and Ubuntu 16.04
  • Mobile device (e.g. iPhone 8, Pixel 2, Samsung Galaxy) if the issue happens on mobile device: A/N
  • TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): no, I used miniconda environment and pip install on Windows 10
  • TensorFlow version (use command below): both TensorFlow version 1.8.0 and TensorFlow version 1.8.0
  • Python version: both 2.7 and 3.6
  • Bazel version (if compiling from source): N/A
  • GCC/Compiler version (if compiling from source): N/A
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: N/A
  • GPU model and memory: N/A
  • Exact command to reproduce: the code

You can collect some of this information using our environment capture script:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tools/tf_env_collect.sh

You can obtain the TensorFlow version with

python -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.GIT_VERSION, tf.VERSION)"

Describe the problem

Line 1: Line 24: 2018-09-11 14:16:17,930 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 1258.4746, step = 1
Line 2: Line 25: 2018-09-11 14:16:17,930 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 1258.4746, step = 1
Line 3: Line 232: 2018-09-11 14:16:22,078 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 101 (4.148 sec)
Line 4: Line 233: 2018-09-11 14:16:22,078 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 101 (4.148 sec)
Line 5: Line 436: 2018-09-11 14:16:25,565 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 201 (3.487 sec)
Line 6: Line 437: 2018-09-11 14:16:25,565 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 201 (3.487 sec)
Line 7: Line 640: 2018-09-11 14:16:29,490 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 301 (3.925 sec)
Line 8: Line 641: 2018-09-11 14:16:29,490 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 301 (3.925 sec)
Line 9: Line 844: 2018-09-11 14:16:33,250 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 401 (3.760 sec)
Line 10: Line 845: 2018-09-11 14:16:33,250 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 401 (3.760 sec)
Line 11: Line 1048: 2018-09-11 14:16:36,489 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 501 (3.239 sec)
Line 12: Line 1049: 2018-09-11 14:16:36,489 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 501 (3.239 sec)
Line 13: Line 1252: 2018-09-11 14:16:40,309 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 601 (3.820 sec)
Line 14: Line 1253: 2018-09-11 14:16:40,309 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 601 (3.820 sec)
Line 15: Line 1456: 2018-09-11 14:16:43,931 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 701 (3.623 sec)
Line 16: Line 1457: 2018-09-11 14:16:43,931 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 701 (3.623 sec)
Line 17: Line 1534: 2018-09-11 14:16:45,488 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56
Line 18: Line 1535: 2018-09-11 14:16:45,488 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56

As can seen from the log file extraction contained lines "loss =", the loss value does not get updated after second evaluation.

Source code / logs

Complete log could be found here

body:
------------------------

### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow)**:
yes [the code to reproduce the bug](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1ahzI5vZQwqXB0TsjI8dSVCGGH7z-ut0f)
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: both, Windows 10 and Ubuntu 16.04
- **Mobile device (e.g. iPhone 8, Pixel 2, Samsung Galaxy) if the issue happens on mobile device**: A/N
- **TensorFlow installed from (source or binary)**: no, I used miniconda environment and pip install on Windows 10
- **TensorFlow version (use command below)**: both TensorFlow version 1.8.0 and TensorFlow version 1.8.0
- **Python version**: both 2.7 and 3.6
- **Bazel version (if compiling from source)**: N/A
- **GCC/Compiler version (if compiling from source)**: N/A
- **CUDA/cuDNN version**: N/A
- **GPU model and memory**: N/A
- **Exact command to reproduce**: [the code](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1ahzI5vZQwqXB0TsjI8dSVCGGH7z-ut0f)

You can collect some of this information using our environment capture script:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tools/tf_env_collect.sh

You can obtain the TensorFlow version with

python -c "import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.GIT_VERSION, tf.VERSION)"

### Describe the problem

> Line 1: 	Line 24: 2018-09-11 14:16:17,930 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 1258.4746, step = 1
	Line 2: 	Line 25: 2018-09-11 14:16:17,930 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 1258.4746, step = 1
	Line 3: 	Line 232: 2018-09-11 14:16:22,078 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 101 (4.148 sec)
	Line 4: 	Line 233: 2018-09-11 14:16:22,078 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 101 (4.148 sec)
	Line 5: 	Line 436: 2018-09-11 14:16:25,565 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 201 (3.487 sec)
	Line 6: 	Line 437: 2018-09-11 14:16:25,565 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 201 (3.487 sec)
	Line 7: 	Line 640: 2018-09-11 14:16:29,490 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 301 (3.925 sec)
	Line 8: 	Line 641: 2018-09-11 14:16:29,490 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 301 (3.925 sec)
	Line 9: 	Line 844: 2018-09-11 14:16:33,250 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 401 (3.760 sec)
	Line 10: 	Line 845: 2018-09-11 14:16:33,250 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 401 (3.760 sec)
	Line 11: 	Line 1048: 2018-09-11 14:16:36,489 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 501 (3.239 sec)
	Line 12: 	Line 1049: 2018-09-11 14:16:36,489 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 501 (3.239 sec)
	Line 13: 	Line 1252: 2018-09-11 14:16:40,309 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 601 (3.820 sec)
	Line 14: 	Line 1253: 2018-09-11 14:16:40,309 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 601 (3.820 sec)
	Line 15: 	Line 1456: 2018-09-11 14:16:43,931 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 701 (3.623 sec)
	Line 16: 	Line 1457: 2018-09-11 14:16:43,931 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56178, step = 701 (3.623 sec)
	Line 17: 	Line 1534: 2018-09-11 14:16:45,488 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56
	Line 18: 	Line 1535: 2018-09-11 14:16:45,488 - tensorflow - INFO - loss = 42.56

As can seen from the log file extraction contained lines "loss =", the loss value **does not get updated** after second evaluation. 

### Source code / logs
Complete log could be found [here](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1vy0GDKK4HMdAirLGewM2vUa_61MGfc_x)
